item.title: SpaceX 宣布收购 xAI，组建 1.25 万亿美元太空与 AI 巨头
item.guid: SpaceX-宣布收购-xAI，组建-1.25-万亿美元太空与-AI-巨头
item.description:
Early this morning, SpaceX issued a statement announcing the completion of its acquisition of xAI, integrating both businesses into a vertical system covering rocket launches, space internet, direct-to-mobile communication, and AI computing. 今天凌晨，SpaceX 发表声明，宣布已完成对 xAI 的收购，将双方业务整合为一个覆盖火箭发射、太空互联网、直连移动通信与人工智能计算的垂直体系。

The statement noted that the merged company will cover businesses such as rocket launches, space internet, direct-to-mobile device communication, and real-time information platforms. 声明指出，合并后的公司将覆盖火箭发射、太空互联网、直连移动设备通信以及实时信息平台等业务。

Musk stated that within the next two to three years, "performing AI computations in space will become the lowest-cost method," which will enable companies to train models and process data with higher efficiency, thereby accelerating physics research and the invention of new technologies. 马斯克表示，在未来两到三年内，「在太空中进行 AI 计算将成为最低成本的方式」，这将使企业能够以更高效率训练模型并处理数据，从而加速物理学研究与新技术发明。

Bloomberg, citing sources, reported that the merged new company's valuation has reached $1.25 trillion (approximately 8.7 trillion RMB at current exchange rates), and it is expected to issue shares at a price of $526.59 per share. SpaceX still plans to proceed with an initial public offering of up to $50 billion this year. 彭博社援引知情人士称，合并后新公司的估值达到 1.25 万亿美元（现汇率约合 8.7 万亿元人民币），预计将以每股 526.59 美元的价格进行股份发行，SpaceX 仍计划在今年推进规模可达 500 亿美元的首次公开募股。

Previously, xAI completed a financing round in January this year, reaching a valuation of $230 billion; SpaceX, on the other hand, was valued at approximately $800 billion in its share sale plan in December last year. 此前，xAI 在今年 1 月完成融资，估值达到 2300 亿美元；SpaceX 则在去年 12 月的股份出售计划中估值约为 8000 亿美元。

The report also mentioned that SpaceX is seeking regulatory approval to launch up to 1 million satellites into Earth's orbit to support its space data center concept. 报道还提到，SpaceX 正寻求监管许可，计划发射多达 100 万颗卫星进入地球轨道，以支持其太空数据中心构想。

The merger will further strengthen the synergy of capital, computing power, and talent among Musk's businesses, including the social platform X, which has already merged with xAI, and its chatbot Grok. xAI currently spends about $1 billion per month, and the merger is seen as an important measure to alleviate its high cost pressure. 合并将进一步强化马斯克旗下业务之间的资本、算力与人才协同，包括已与 xAI 合并的社交平台 X 及其聊天机器人 Grok。xAI 目前每月支出约 10 亿美元，合并被视为缓解其高额成本压力的重要举措。

As one of Musk's most stable businesses, SpaceX is currently the only company in the United States capable of regularly performing crewed missions to the International Space Station, and is also an important launch service provider for NASA and the U.S. Department of Defense. 作为马斯克最稳定的业务之一，SpaceX 目前是美国唯一能够常态化执行国际空间站载人任务的企业，同时也是 NASA 与美国国防部的重要发射服务提供商。

Its Starlink network has deployed over 9,000 satellites, showing significant revenue growth, and is considered an important source of cash flow to support xAI's business in the future. 其星链网络已部署超过 9000 颗卫星，收入增长显著，并被视为未来支撑 xAI 业务的重要现金流来源。

item.title: 黄仁勋：「从未承诺」向 OpenAI 投资 1000 亿美元
item.guid: 黄仁勋：「从未承诺」向-OpenAI-投资-1000-亿美元
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang recently stated in an interview that the rumored $100 billion investment plan in OpenAI 'was never a commitment,' emphasizing that Nvidia would evaluate each funding round 'step by step'. 据彭博社报道，英伟达 CEO 黄仁勋近日在接受采访时表示，外界所称的对 OpenAI 投资 1000 亿美元计划「从来不是承诺」，并强调英伟达会「一步一步」评估每一轮融资。

He pointed out that OpenAI had invited Nvidia to invest up to $100 billion, and the company 'felt honored' by this, but actual investment would proceed gradually depending on the situation. 他指出，OpenAI 曾邀请英伟达最高可投资 1000 亿美元，公司对此「感到荣幸」，但实际投入将视情况逐步推进。

According to the report, in the letter of intent signed by both parties last September, Nvidia plans to support OpenAI in building at least a 10GW data center and provide advanced chips for training and deploying AI models. 根据报道，双方在去年 9 月签署的意向书中，英伟达计划支持 OpenAI 建设至少 10GW 规模的数据中心，并提供先进芯片用于训练和部署 AI 模型。

However, The Wall Street Journal previously stated that there were internal doubts at Nvidia about the plan, with some individuals concerned about OpenAI's lack of discipline in its business model and uneasy about the competitive landscape. 不过《华尔街日报》此前称，英伟达内部对该计划存在疑虑，部分人士担心 OpenAI 的商业模式缺乏纪律性，同时对竞争态势感到不安。

Jensen Huang responded by calling such claims 'nonsense,' emphasizing that he still believes in the importance of OpenAI, calling it 'one of the most influential companies of our time'. 黄仁勋对此回应称相关说法是「胡说」，并强调他依然相信 OpenAI 的重要性，称其为「我们这个时代最具影响力的公司之一」。

Huang added that Nvidia's contribution in the current funding round would not be close to $100 billion, but the overall investment scale would still be 'very significant,' potentially even becoming the largest investment in the company's history. 黄仁勋补充，英伟达在当前融资轮中的出资额不会接近 1000 亿美元，但整体投资规模仍将「非常巨大」，甚至可能成为公司历史上最大的一笔投资。

He also stated that the deployment progress of the first 1GW data center in their collaboration 'depends on OpenAI,' as the relevant infrastructure is led by them. 他同时表示，双方合作的首个 1GW 数据中心部署进度「取决于 OpenAI」，因为相关基础设施由对方主导。

item.title: 智谱 GLM-5、MiniMax M2.2 将至，春节成大模型发布高峰
item.guid: 智谱-GLM-5、MiniMax-M2.2-将至，春节成大模型发布高峰
item.description:
According to the South China Morning Post, in the final sprint phase before the Lunar New Year, several leading AI laboratories in China are intensively launching new generations of large models, attempting to gain exposure and user mindshare during the holiday period. 据《南华早报》报道，在春节前的最后冲刺阶段，国内多家前沿人工智能实验室正密集推出新一代大模型，试图在节日期间抢占曝光度与用户心智。

Following Alibaba and Moonshot AI's lead in releasing Qwen3-Max-Thinking and Kimi 2.5 last week, Zhipu AI and MiniMax are also reportedly set to update their flagship models within the next two weeks. 阿里与月之暗面上周率先发布 Qwen3-Max-Thinking 与 Kimi 2.5 后，智谱 AI 与 MiniMax 也被曝将于未来两周内更新旗舰模型。

Insiders say Zhipu AI plans to launch GLM-5 before the Lunar New Year, which is the fifth iteration of the GLM series, expected to bring 'comprehensive and significant' upgrades in creative writing, programming, reasoning, and intelligent agent capabilities. 知情人士称，智谱 AI 计划在春节前推出 GLM-5，这是 GLM 系列的第五代迭代，预计在创意写作、编程、推理与智能 Agent 能力方面带来「全方位且显著」升级。

MiniMax will release M2.2, a minor update based on M2.1, focusing on strengthening programming capabilities. MiniMax 则将发布 M2.2，这是在 M2.1 基础上的小幅更新，重点强化编程能力。

In contrast, DeepSeek will not be launching the 'big move' expected by the public for this year's Lunar New Year. 与此形成对比的是，DeepSeek 今年春节档并不会推出外界期待的「大招」。

Multiple sources revealed that DeepSeek is more likely to only make a minor update to its V3 series. Its next-generation flagship model is expected to be a trillion-parameter foundational model, but due to the expansion in scale leading to slower training speeds, its release has been postponed. 多位消息人士透露，DeepSeek 更可能只会对 V3 系列进行一次小幅更新。其下一代旗舰模型预计为万亿参数级基础模型，但由于规模膨胀导致训练速度放缓，发布时间被推迟。

Additionally, ByteDance will launch a 'three-piece set' during the Lunar New Year: the large language model Doubao 2.0, the image generation model Seedream 5.0, and the video generation model SeedDance 2.0. Alibaba is expected to release its flagship model Qwen 3.5 during the Lunar New Year, focusing on strengthening complex reasoning, mathematics, and coding capabilities. 此外，字节跳动也将在春节期间推出「三件套」：大语言模型 Doubao 2.0、图像生成模型 Seedream 5.0 与视频生成模型 SeedDance 2.0。阿里预计在春节期间发布旗舰模型 Qwen 3.5，重点强化复杂推理、数学与编码能力。

Meanwhile, the competition among tech giants for users during the Lunar New Year has entered a fierce stage. 与此同时，春节科技巨头争夺用户的竞争已进入白热化阶段。

Giants like Alibaba, Tencent, and Baidu are investing massive resources to boost AI application growth: Tencent's "Yuanbao" will distribute 1 billion yuan in digital red packets, Baidu will issue 500 million yuan in red packets through the Wenxin App, and Alibaba also announced yesterday an investment of 3 billion yuan to promote the Qianwen App. 阿里、腾讯、百度等巨头正投入巨额资源推动 AI 应用增长：腾讯的「元宝」将发放 10 亿元数字红包，百度则通过文心 App 派发 5 亿元红包，阿里也于昨日宣布投入 30 亿元推广千问 App。

item.title: OpenAI 发布 macOS 版 Codex 应用
item.guid: OpenAI-发布-macOS-版-Codex-应用
item.description:
Early this morning, OpenAI officially launched its brand-new Codex desktop application, further strengthening its competitiveness in the field of AI coding assistants. 今天凌晨，OpenAI 正式推出全新的 Codex 桌面应用，进一步强化其在 AI 编码助手领域的竞争力。

Currently, the Codex application is temporarily available to all ChatGPT users on Mac, including free users and Go subscribers. To attract existing developers, OpenAI has also temporarily increased the rate limits for paid plans. 目前，Codex 应用暂时向所有使用 Mac 的 ChatGPT 用户开放，包括免费用户与 Go 订阅用户。为吸引现有开发者，OpenAI 还临时提升了付费计划的速率限制。

OpenAI states that the Codex application is designed to be a "command center" for developers, allowing them to manage multiple AI agents within a single interface, support parallel task execution, automate repetitive work, and offer customizable interaction styles. OpenAI 表示，Codex 应用旨在成为开发者的「指挥中心」，可在同一界面中管理多个 AI 智能体，支持并行执行任务、自动化处理重复性工作，并提供可定制的交互风格。

The application integrates the GPT‑5.2‑Codex model, capable of completing complex software development processes within hours. The company states that its internal team previously relied on Codex to complete the development of Sora for Android in 28 days. 应用整合 GPT‑5.2‑Codex 模型，可在数小时内完成复杂软件开发流程。公司称其内部团队曾依靠 Codex 在 28 天内完成 Sora for Android 的开发。

Fortune reports that the launch of Codex comes amidst intensifying competition in AI coding assistants. Anthropic released a similar Claude Code Cowork application in January this year, and Cursor is also growing rapidly. 《财富》报道指出，Codex 的推出正值 AI 编码助手竞争加剧之际。Anthropic 在今年 1 月发布了类似的 Claude Code Cowork 应用，Cursor 也在快速增长。

OpenAI stated that over 1 million developers have used Codex in the past month, including large enterprises like Cisco and startup teams such as Harvey and Sierra. OpenAI 方面称，过去一个月已有超过 100 万开发者使用 Codex，包括 Cisco 等大型企业及 Harvey、Sierra 等初创团队。

item.title: 特斯拉第三代人形机器人官宣今年亮相，预计年产百万台
item.guid: 特斯拉第三代人形机器人官宣今年亮相，预计年产百万台
item.description:
Yesterday, Tesla announced that its third-generation humanoid robot is about to debut and confirmed that the product will be officially released this year. Tesla stated that this generation of robots has been redesigned from first principles, can learn new skills by observing human behavior, and aims for an annual production of millions of units. 昨天，特斯拉宣布第三代人形机器人即将亮相，并确认该产品将在今年正式发布。特斯拉表示，这一代机器人从第一性原理重新设计，可通过观察人类行为学习新技能，目标年产量达到百万台。

According to reports, the new generation of robots can complete tasks through demonstrations, verbal descriptions, and even video examples. Musk stated that its performance will "surprise everyone." 据介绍，新一代机器人能够通过演示、口头描述甚至视频示例完成任务，马斯克称其表现将「令所有人大吃一惊」。

The official statement emphasized that this will be Tesla's first humanoid robot to truly enter mass production. Previously, Optimus's pilot production line was already running at the Fremont factory, and a larger-scale third-generation production line is expected to be built and put into operation this year. 官方强调，这将是特斯拉首款真正走向量产的人形机器人。此前，Optimus 的试生产线已在弗里蒙特工厂运行，更大规模的第三代生产线预计将在今年建成投产。

Previously, Tesla's official account TeslaAI posted on Weibo that the cost per unit of the third-generation humanoid robot is expected to be controlled within 20,000 US dollars (approximately 139,000 RMB) after mass production. 此前，特斯拉官方账号 TeslaAI 在微博发文称，第三代人形机器人量产后单台成本预计可控制在 2 万美元以内（约合 13.9 万元人民币）。

item.title: 奥迪承认 A4 更名 A5「是个错误」，将重新启用传统命名体系
item.guid: 奥迪承认-A4-更名-A5「是个错误」，将重新启用传统命名体系
item.description:
According to Australian media "Drive", Audi has confirmed that its strategy of renaming its classic A4 model to A5 was a "mistake" and plans to restore the A4 nameplate with the next facelift. 据澳大利亚媒体「Drive」报道，奥迪已确认将旗下经典车型 A4 更名为 A5 的策略是一次「错误」，并计划在下一次改款时恢复 A4 车名。

Audi's current CEO, Gernot Döllner, recently stated in a media interview at the Munich Motor Show: "Yes, it was a mistake, and we have corrected it." 奥迪现任 CEO 格诺特・多尔纳（Gernot Döllner）近日在慕尼黑车展接受媒体采访时表示：「没错，这是一个错误，我们已经做出纠正。」

We will return to the original naming system: A stands for sedans, Q for SUVs, and numbers correspond to vehicle size and market segment.

The report points out that Audi had attempted to use odd numbers for internal combustion engine vehicles and even numbers for pure electric models to differentiate power types in showrooms. A4 was thus merged into the A5 series, A6 was also planned to be renamed A7, and the high-performance S/RS series was adjusted accordingly. 报道指出，奥迪曾试图以奇数对应燃油车、偶数对应纯电车型，以便在展厅中区分动力类型。A4 因此被并入 A5 序列，A6 也计划更名为 A7，高性能 S/RS 系列同步调整。

However, this system quickly caused confusion in the global market: dealer inquiries increased, consumers found it difficult to understand the relationship between the new A5 and the original A5 coupe, and the A6L in the Chinese market was not renamed due to its special status, further exacerbating the inconsistency of the system. 然而，这套体系在全球市场迅速引发混淆：经销商咨询量上升，消费者难以理解 A5 与原有轿跑 A5 的关系，中国市场 A6L 又因特殊地位未更名，进一步加剧体系不一致。

Döllner emphasized in interviews with both "Autocar" and Drive that the decision to rename was "finalized too late," which was one of the key mistakes, as only a few months remained until mass production, leading to rushed execution. 多尔纳在接受《Autocar》与 Drive 采访时均强调，更名决策「敲定得太晚」是关键失误之一，距离量产仅剩数月，导致执行仓促。

Regarding whether the A4 name will be restored in the future, he clearly stated that "it is possible" and used A6 as the anchor point for the future naming system. 对于未来是否恢复 A4 车名，他明确表示「这是有可能的」，并以 A6 作为未来命名体系的锚点。

Meanwhile, Audi's electrification strategy is also being adjusted. As the brand slows down its plan to "only sell electric vehicles in most markets from 2033," the positioning of the A4 name, originally expected to be used only for pure electric sedans, has become unclear. 与此同时，奥迪的电动化战略也在调整。随着品牌放缓「2033 年起多数市场仅售电动车」的计划，原本预期仅用于纯电轿车的 A4 名称定位变得不再明确。

Audi's global sales declined by 11.8% in 2024, with electric vehicle sales dropping by 8% year-on-year, also becoming one of the background factors for the naming system rollback. 2024 年奥迪全球销量下滑 11.8%，其中电动车销量同比下降 8%，也成为命名体系回调的背景因素之一。

item.title: 余承东确认问界 M6 春季亮相
item.guid: 余承东确认问界-M6-春季亮相
item.description:
Yesterday, Richard Yu, Huawei's Executive Director and CEO of Consumer BG, announced on Weibo that the AITO M6 will debut in spring. Prior to the official announcement, winter test footage of the AITO M6 has already been exposed. 昨天，华为常务董事、终端 BG 董事长余承东在微博发文宣布问界 M6 将于春季亮相。在官宣前夕，问界 M6 的冬测影像已曝光。

According to public footage, the new car continues the family's design language, but the front face does not feature a full-width daytime running light, presenting a more differentiated visual style. The body lines are rounded, and the roof is equipped with lidar, meaning it will be equipped with Huawei's advanced intelligent driving assistance system ADS. 根据公开画面，新车延续家族化设计语言，但前脸未采用贯穿式日行灯，呈现更具差异化的视觉风格。车身线条圆润，车顶搭载激光雷达，意味着其将配备华为高阶智能驾驶辅助系统 ADS。

Last December, Richard Yu revealed that this year, the five "Jie" product matrix under HarmonyOS Smart Travel will be completed, with the AITO M6 being a crucial part. In addition, the AITO brand will also promote the iterative upgrade of existing models, and the "Zunjie" brand plans to launch ultra-high-end luxury sedans. 去年 12 月，余承东曾透露，今年鸿蒙智行旗下五个「界」的产品矩阵将补齐，问界 M6 是关键一环。此外，问界品牌还将推进现有车型的迭代升级，而「尊界」品牌也计划推出超高端豪华轿车。

item.title: 2026 支付宝集福今日上线：新增「健康福」，线下「碰一下」也能得福
item.guid: 2026-支付宝集福今日上线：新增「健康福」，线下「碰一下」也能得福
item.description:
Today, Alipay's "Collect Five Blessings" (Jifu) event officially launched. This year's event adds a "Health Blessing" (Jiankang Fu) on top of the traditional "Five Blessings," issued by the health AI application "Ant Afu." The event will continue until Lunar New Year's Eve. 今天，支付宝「集福啦」活动正式上线，今年的活动在传统「五福」的基础上新增「健康福」，由健康 AI 应用「蚂蚁阿福」发放，活动将持续至除夕夜。

After users enter the Jifu event page from the Alipay homepage and claim the "Health Blessing," they will simultaneously receive a real-time health red packet, which can be used for offline Alipay payment scenarios within 7 days. 用户从支付宝首页进入集福会场领取「健康福」后，可同步获得一个实时到账的健康红包，可在 7 天内用于线下支付宝支付场景。

In addition to the new blessing cards, this year's Jifu gameplay has also been further expanded. 除新增福卡外，今年集福玩法也进一步扩展。

  • Online, users can obtain blessing cards by scanning the character "福" (Fu) or real objects/photos containing the character "马" (Ma) or horse elements using the "Lingguang Scan Fu" feature in the Alipay App; 在线上，用户可通过支付宝 App 的「灵光扫福」扫描「福」字或含有「马」字、马元素的实物、照片获得福卡；
  • Offline, "Tap to Get" in various scenarios such as payment, picking up express deliveries, cycling, charging, entering parks, and visiting exhibitions can also trigger the acquisition of blessing cards. 在线下，支付、取快递、骑车、充电、入园、逛展等多场景的「碰一下」也可触发福卡获取。

This year's event features a total of 19 sets of themed blessing cards, covering the classic Five Blessings as well as multiple IPs from games, trendy toys, and film/television. Users can choose any 6 sets to collect. For each set collected, a 1.68 yuan red packet will be locked, and all red packets will be drawn uniformly at 22:18 on Lunar New Year's Eve. 今年活动共推出 19 套主题福卡，覆盖经典五福及游戏、潮玩、影视等多个 IP，用户可从中任选 6 套进行收集，每集齐一套可锁定 1.68 元红包，所有红包将在除夕夜 22:18 统一开奖。

During the event, experiencing the "Ant Afu" feature also offers a chance to obtain rare cards and universal blessing cards. 活动期间体验「蚂蚁阿福」功能，还有机会获得稀有卡与万能福。

Since its launch in 2016, Alipay's Jifu event has been held for 11 consecutive years, with over 1 billion cumulative participants. The project leader stated that the Jifu event, by interpreting tradition through technology, has become a "digital New Year custom" accompanying hundreds of millions of users. 自 2016 年推出以来，支付宝集福活动已连续举办 11 年，累计参与用户超过 10 亿。项目负责人表示，集福活动通过技术诠释传统，已成为陪伴数亿用户的「数字新年俗」。

item.title: 腾讯回应元宝红包助力刷屏质疑：无门槛领取与诱导分享不同
item.guid: 腾讯回应元宝红包助力刷屏质疑：无门槛领取与诱导分享不同
item.description:
According to The Paper, Tencent Yuanbao's "Spring Festival Red Packet" event recently went viral on multiple social platforms, sparking discussions about whether its sharing mechanism violates WeChat's external link management regulations. 据澎湃新闻报道，腾讯元宝「春节红包」活动近日在多个社交平台刷屏，引发关于分享机制是否触及微信外链管理规范的讨论。

The report pointed out that after the event launched, users could get additional lottery chances by sharing, with a maximum of 30 times. This mechanism promoted the rapid viral spread of red packets on social networks. 报道指出，活动上线后，用户通过分享可获得额外抽奖次数，最高可叠加 30 次，这一机制推动了红包在社交网络的快速裂变传播。

In response to external doubts, Tencent internally issued an internal letter yesterday, stating that the basic logic of Yuanbao's Spring Festival red packets is "claim without any prerequisites," meaning users can receive basic red packets without completing tasks like boosting or collecting cards, which is fundamentally different from the "incentivized sharing" model that the platform has long cracked down on. 针对外界质疑，腾讯内部昨天发布内部信回应称，元宝春节红包的基础逻辑为「无门槛领取」，用户无需完成助力、集卡等任务即可获得基础红包，与平台长期打击的「诱导分享」模式存在本质区别。

Tencent stated that the team is in communication with legal, public relations, and relevant business departments to comprehensively assess the compliance boundaries of the event and will continue to monitor user feedback and experience. 腾讯表示，团队正与法务、公关及相关业务部门保持沟通，综合研判活动的合规边界，并将持续关注用户反馈与体验。

According to Beike Finance, the event's popularity has also given rise to gray services. 另据贝壳财经报道，活动的火爆也催生了灰色服务。

On second-hand trading platforms, a large number of "Yuanbao red packet boosting services" have appeared, with a single boost priced at about 1 yuan, and some merchants offering packages ranging from 10 to 13 yuan. 在二手交易平台上，出现大量「元宝红包助力服务」，单次助力价格约为 1 元，部分商家提供 10 至 13 元不等的套餐。

Reporters' actual tests found that boosting services are usually completed within 10 minutes and can increase lottery chances by 10, but since the amount of individual cash red packets is generally less than 1 yuan, the overall income is difficult to cover the expenditure. 记者实测发现，助力服务通常在 10 分钟内完成，可增加 10 次抽奖机会，但由于单个现金红包金额普遍低于 1 元，整体收益难以覆盖支出。

Some "scalpers" who engage in concert ticket-grabbing businesses have also joined the boosting services, even forming "boosting groups" for promotion. 部分从事演唱会抢票业务的「黄牛」也加入助力服务，甚至组建「助力群」进行推广。

item.title: 曝苹果封堵 Final Cut Pro「隔空投送」漏洞
item.guid: 曝苹果封堵-Final-Cut-Pro「隔空投送」漏洞
item.description:
According to X user @nikewrayy, Apple may be further tightening the authorization verification mechanism for professional software, and Final Cut Pro sent via AirDrop is no longer usable. 据 X 用户 @nikewrayy 消息，苹果或正在进一步收紧专业软件的授权验证机制，通过 AirDrop（隔空投送）发送的 Final Cut Pro 已经不再可用。

Exposed screenshots show that when users try to run a copy of Final Cut Pro not authorized by the current Apple ID, the software is blocked at the "Validating Purchase…" stage of the startup page, and a warning pop-up appears: 曝光的截图显示，当用户尝试运行未获当前 Apple ID 授权的 Final Cut Pro 副本时，软件会在启动页面的「Validating Purchase…」（验证购买）阶段被拦截，并弹出警告弹窗提示：

No valid App Store purchase record found. Please delete this version of Final Cut Pro and get it from the App Store.

Previously, some users found that they could transfer a purchased Final Cut Pro.app package from one Mac to another via AirDrop in an Apple Store and run it directly without logging in with the purchasing account. 此前，部分用户发现，可以通过 AirDrop 在 Apple Store 将已购买的 Final Cut Pro.app 包从一台 Mac 传输至另一台 Mac，在未登录购买账号的情况下直接运行。

It is worth noting that Apple just launched the Apple Creator Studio subscription service last month, integrating apps including Final Cut Pro, Logic Pro, Pixelmator Pro, as well as new AI features and premium content from the iWork suite, all into one subscription. 值得注意的是，苹果在上个月刚刚推出 Apple Creator Studio 订阅服务，将包括 Final Cut Pro、Logic Pro、Pixelmator Pro 在内的 App 以及 iWork 套件中的新 AI 功能与高级内容全部整合在一个订阅中。

It is currently unclear whether this verification mechanism will be simultaneously deployed to other Apple professional creative software such as Logic Pro and Motion. 目前尚不清楚这一验证机制是否会同步部署至 Logic Pro、Motion 等其他苹果专业创意软件。

item.title: 逐际动力 B 轮融资 2 亿美元，获京东、蔚来资本加码
item.guid: 逐际动力-B-轮融资-2-亿美元，获京东、蔚来资本加码
item.description:
Yesterday, LimX Dynamics announced the completion of its $200 million Series B funding round. 昨天，逐际动力 LimX Dynamics 宣布完成 2 亿美元 B 轮融资。

This round of financing was invested by several well-known domestic and international institutions, including Stone Venture (UAE), Oriental Fortune Capital, Cornerstone Capital, and GF Xinde. Strategic industrial investors such as JD.com and Zhongding Group participated, and existing shareholders such as SAIC Group's Shangqi Capital and NIO Capital continued to increase their investment. 本轮融资由阿联酋磊石资本（Stone Venture）、东方富海、基石资本、广发信德等多家国内外知名机构投资，京东、中鼎股份等战略产业投资人参与，老股东上汽集团旗下尚颀资本、蔚来资本等持续加码。

LimX Dynamics stated that this round of financing will be used to promote breakthroughs in the core technology of embodied intelligence's "cerebrum-cerebellum fusion," as well as original innovation in general-purpose humanoid robots and modular base robots. 逐际动力表示，本轮融资将用于推动具身智能大小脑融合核心技术的突破，以及通用人形机器人和模块化基座机器人的原始创新。

The company will continue to increase R&D and market investment this year, further expanding into the Chinese and global markets through product engineering and the construction of a supply chain ecosystem. 公司将在今年继续加大研发和市场投入，通过产品工程化与供应链生态体系建设，进一步拓展中国和全球市场。

Founded in 2022 and headquartered in Shenzhen, LimX Dynamics is an AI-driven humanoid robot company that has developed multiple products, including full-size humanoid robots and multi-form robots like TRON. 逐际动力成立于 2022 年，总部位于深圳，是一家 AI 驱动的人形机器人公司，目前已衍生出包括全尺寸人形机器人、多形态机器人 TRON 等多款产品。

item.title: 甲骨文拟今年筹资最高 500 亿美元加码云基础设施建设
item.guid: 甲骨文拟今年筹资最高-500-亿美元加码云基础设施建设
item.description:
According to Bloomberg, Oracle plans to raise $45 billion to $50 billion this year through debt and equity financing to expand its cloud infrastructure and meet the contracted computing power demands from large clients, including AMD, Meta, Nvidia, OpenAI, TikTok, and xAI. 据彭博社报道，甲骨文 Oracle 计划今年通过债务与股权融资筹集 450 亿至 500 亿美元，用于扩建云基础设施，以满足来自大型客户（包括 AMD、Meta、英伟达、OpenAI、TikTok 与 xAI 等）的已签约算力需求。

The company stated that the scale of this funding round reflects the financial pressure of building cloud infrastructure driven by AI. 公司表示，此轮融资规模反映了在 AI 推动下云计算基础设施建设的资金压力。

The report points out that Oracle will raise funds through two types of methods: 报道指出，甲骨文将通过两类方式筹集资金：

    Half from mandatory convertible preferred shares, common shares, and an at-the-market offering program of up to $20 billion;

    The other half will come from a one-time unsecured bond issuance in early 2026, led by Goldman Sachs, with Citi handling the equity-related issuance.

Last year, Oracle issued $18 billion in bonds, one of the largest corporate bond issuances of the year. 去年，甲骨文已发行 180 亿美元债券，是当年规模最大的企业债之一。

It is worth noting that Oracle's stock price has fallen by approximately 50% since reaching an all-time high last September, with its market capitalization evaporating by about $460 billion. 值得注意的是，甲骨文的股价自去年 9 月创下历史高点以来已下跌约 50%，市值蒸发约 4600 亿美元。

Analysts point out that the ongoing AI investment boom has raised market concerns about the return cycle. Due to data center construction, Oracle's free cash flow has turned negative and is expected to continue until 2030. The company will still need to invest tens of billions of dollars in chip procurement and data center leasing in the coming years. 分析师指出，持续的 AI 投资热潮引发市场对回报周期的担忧，因数据中心建设，甲骨文的自由现金流已转为负值，预计将持续至 2030 年。公司未来数年仍需投入数百亿美元用于芯片采购与数据中心租赁。

The report also mentioned that OpenAI has committed to spending approximately $300 billion on server rentals on Oracle Cloud, but it has not yet become profitable, making outsiders more cautious about Oracle's capital expenditure return cycle. 报道还提到，OpenAI 已承诺在甲骨文云上投入约 3000 亿美元租用服务器，但其尚未盈利，使外界对甲骨文的资本开支回报周期更加谨慎。

Market concerns about Oracle's credit risk also pushed its credit default swap prices to a high in December last year, the highest since the 2008 financial crisis. 市场对甲骨文信用风险的担忧也推动其信用违约掉期价格在去年 12 月升至 2008 年金融危机以来高位。

Analysts believe that Oracle's timing in releasing this news on Sunday is quite rare, possibly intended to send a signal of stability to investors before the market opens this week, to curb the continuous decline in stock prices. 分析人士认为，甲骨文在周日发布此消息的时点颇为罕见，或意在于本周开盘前向投资者传递稳定信号，以遏制股价持续下滑。

item.title: 💡 iPod 之父：当爹之后重新开始审视隐私风险
item.guid: 💡-iPod-之父：当爹之后重新开始审视隐私风险
item.description:
According to Business Insider, "Father of the iPod" Tony Fadell recently stated in a podcast interview that after becoming a parent, his own views on privacy issues, as well as those of several tech founders in Silicon Valley, have undergone a significant shift. 据《商业内幕》报道，「iPod 之父」托尼 · 法德尔（Tony Fadell）近日在播客访谈中表示，成为父母后，他本人以及硅谷多位科技创始人对隐私问题的看法出现明显转变。

He pointed out that before having children, many tech professionals had a more radical attitude towards privacy, willing to sacrifice personal data driven by technological innovation; however, this attitude is changing in the face of risks such as deepfakes and social engineering. 他指出，在拥有孩子之前，许多科技从业者对隐私的态度更为激进，愿意在技术创新的推动下牺牲个人数据；但在面对深度伪造、社会工程学等风险后，这种态度正在发生变化。

Fadell mentioned that Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg, Google co-founders Larry Page and Sergey Brin, after becoming parents, have a "completely different" way of understanding the world. 法德尔提到，Meta CEO 马克 · 扎克伯格、Google 联合创始人拉里 · 佩奇与谢尔盖 · 布林在成为父母后，对世界的理解方式「完全不一样」。

My thoughts were very different before and after having children.

He stated that many founders are now rethinking how much data they are willing to hand over, and how to protect the privacy of their families and children. 他表示，许多创始人如今会重新思考自己愿意交出多少数据，以及如何保护家庭与孩子的隐私。

Fadell particularly emphasized the privacy challenges in the age of AI. 法德尔特别强调了 AI 时代的隐私挑战。

He believes that truly revolutionary AI devices in the future will often require a large amount of personal data and real-time input, which will force society and business leaders to make tougher trade-offs between innovation and privacy. 他认为，未来真正具有革命性的 AI 设备往往需要大量个人数据与实时输入，这将迫使社会与企业领导者在创新与隐私之间做出更艰难的取舍。

He revealed that some tech founders have even reflected with a "if only I could do it over again" sentiment, but past decisions cannot be reversed. 他透露，部分科技创始人甚至产生了「如果能重来就好了」的反思，但过去的决策已无法逆转。

Meanwhile, global regulatory bodies are strengthening their scrutiny of AI and privacy issues. 与此同时，全球监管机构正加强对 AI 与隐私议题的审查。

xAI is under investigation in multiple regions for its models generating unauthorized sexualized images of real people (including minors); Meta is also being questioned about how its chatbots interact with minors. The tension between privacy protection and AI technology development is accelerating. xAI 因其模型生成未授权的真实人物（包括未成年人）性化图像而遭到多地调查；Meta 也因聊天机器人与未成年人互动方式受到质询。隐私保护与 AI 技术发展之间的张力正在加速显现。

item.title: OPPO Find N6 通过多国认证，有望近期上市
item.guid: OPPO-Find-N6-通过多国认证，有望近期上市
item.description:
According to My Mobile, the OPPO Find N6 foldable phone has recently passed multiple certifications, including UAE TDRA, Singapore IMDA, and TUV, all with model number CPH2765. 据 My Mobile 报道，OPPO Find N6 折叠屏手机近日已通过阿联酋 TDRA、新加坡 IMDA 以及 TUV 等多项认证，型号均为 CPH2765。

Meanwhile, TUV certification has revealed the device's charging specifications, showing support for 80W wired fast charging, consistent with previous 3C information. 与此同时，TUV 认证披露了该机的充电规格，显示其支持 80W 有线快充，与此前 3C 信息一致。

Regarding specific configurations, a summary of recent leaks is as follows: 具体配置方面，结合近期爆料汇总如下：

    Equipped with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen5 processor;

    Features an 8.12-inch 2K LTPO UTG main screen and a 6.62-inch secondary screen;

    Rear triple camera setup of 50MP + 50MP + 200MP, with an additional 2MP multispectral lens;

    Built-in "6K-level" dual-cell solution, with a total typical capacity of approximately 6000mAh;

    Weighs approximately 225g.

It is worth noting that this device will for the first time support an AI stylus and will offer two options: a standard version and a Beidou satellite communication version. 值得注意的是，该机将首次支持 AI 手写笔，并提供普通版与北斗卫星通信版两种选择。

Multiple sources indicate that the Find N6 will likely be released in the Chinese market after the Spring Festival, followed by a simultaneous launch in overseas markets. Following the pace of last year's Find N5, OPPO may continue to adopt a strategy of simultaneous release in China and globally. 多方消息称，Find N6 大概率会在春节后于中国市场发布，随后同步登陆海外市场。参考去年 Find N5 的节奏，OPPO 可能会继续采用中国与全球同日发布的策略。

item.title: 阶跃星辰发布更快更强的开源 Agent 基座模型 Step 3.5 Flash
item.guid: 阶跃星辰发布更快更强的开源-Agent-基座模型-Step-3.5-Flash
item.description:
Yesterday, Jieyue Xingchen announced the launch of its new open-source base model "Step 3.5 Flash", featuring faster inference speed, stronger Agent capabilities, and more stable performance in long-chain tasks. 昨天，阶跃星辰宣布推出全新的开源基座模型「Step 3.5 Flash」，主打更快推理速度、更强 Agent 能力与更稳的长链条任务表现。

    Adopts a sparse MoE architecture with a total of 196 billion parameters, where only about 11 billion parameters are activated per token;

    Introduces MTP-3 technology, allowing the model to predict 3 tokens at once, significantly improving generation efficiency;

    For long text processing, it uses a 3:1 sliding window and global attention hybrid architecture (SWA + Full Attention), capable of efficiently handling 256K context and maintaining stability in complex tasks.

Official data shows that in single-request code-related tasks, Step 3.5 Flash's inference speed can reach up to 350 TPS. In Agent scenarios and mathematical tasks, its performance is already close to that of closed-source models. 官方数据显示，在单请求代码类任务中，Step 3.5 Flash 推理速度最高可达 350 TPS。在 Agent 场景与数学任务中，其性能已接近闭源模型。

Benchmark charts displayed by the official show that after enabling Parallel Thinking, the model achieved further performance improvements in tests such as XBench-DeepSearch. 官方展示的基准图表显示，在开启 Parallel Thinking 后，模型在 XBench-DeepSearch 等测试中获得进一步性能提升。

Jieyue Xingchen stated that the goal of Step 3.5 Flash is not only to be "smarter" but also to emphasize "trustworthiness," "responsiveness," and "cost-controllability." 阶跃星辰表示，Step 3.5 Flash 的目标不仅是「更聪明」，更强调「值得信任」「响应迅速」与「成本可控」。

The official also showcased several application cases, including high-speed mathematical reasoning, automatic programming to generate a 3D Earth visualization platform, and in edge-cloud collaborative scenarios, breaking down price comparison tasks, integrating data from Taobao, JD, and Pinduoduo, and providing purchasing advice, demonstrating its Agent capabilities in complex task planning and execution. 官方还展示了多个应用案例，包括高速数学推理、自动编程生成三维地球可视化平台、以及在端云协同场景中拆解比价任务、整合淘宝、京东与拼多多数据并给出购买建议，体现其在复杂任务规划与执行中的 Agent 能力。

Jieyue Xingchen also announced that training for the next-generation model, Step 4, has commenced. 阶跃星辰同时宣布下一代模型 Step 4 的训练已启动。

item.title: 灵光 App 上新：上传图片即可生成应用，API 能力全面增强
item.guid: 灵光-App-上新：上传图片即可生成应用，API-能力全面增强
item.description:
Yesterday, Ant Group's general AI assistant Lingguang announced a comprehensive upgrade to its core feature "Flash App," officially launching two new capabilities: "Upload Image to Generate App" and "Desktop Widgets," and integrating nearly 20 API tools. 昨天，蚂蚁集团旗下通用 AI 助手灵光宣布对其核心功能「闪应用」进行全面升级，正式推出「上传图片生应用」与「桌面小组件」两大新能力，并集成了近 20 项 API 工具。

According to reports, this update aims to accelerate the evolution of AI applications from "information providers" to "interactive tool deliverers" by lowering development barriers and expanding interaction dimensions. 据介绍，此次更新旨在通过降低开发门槛与拓展交互维度，加速 AI 应用从「信息提供者」向「可交互工具交付者」演进。

In the newly added "Upload Image to Generate App" feature, the system intelligently parses image content using multimodal technology, enabling UI interface replication, structured extraction of key information, and scene style recognition. 在新增的「上传图片生应用」功能中，系统利用多模态技术智能解析图片内容，能够实现 UI 界面复刻、关键信息结构化提取及场景风格识别。

Users only need to upload static images such as hand-drawn sketches, student grade reports, or product sales charts, and combine them with personalized instructions to instantly convert them into online tools with data visualization and collaboration features. 用户只需上传如手绘草图、学生成绩表或产品销量榜等静态图片，结合个性化指令，即可一键将其转化为具备数据可视化与协同功能的在线工具。

This upgrade also significantly expanded underlying capabilities, newly integrating nearly 20 APIs such as sound effect synthesis, Large Language Model (LLM) invocation, calendar services, text-to-speech, persistent storage, gyroscope, and vibration feedback. The opening of these interfaces allows applications built by users to have more complex logic and interactive experiences. 此次升级还大幅扩充了底层能力，新增集成了音效合成、大语言模型（LLM）调用、日历服务、文本朗读、持久化存储以及陀螺仪、震动反馈等近 20 项 API。这些接口的开放让用户构建的应用具备了更复杂的逻辑与交互体验。

This update also brings the opening of hardware sensor permissions, enabling the possibility of somatic interaction for lightweight applications. 本次更新还带来硬件传感器权限的开放，为轻应用带来了体感交互的可能性。

By calling the phone's gyroscope and vibration feedback modules, developers can create mini-games or simulation applications with immersive experiences (such as "Hand Relaxation Simulator"), triggering customized sound effects and physical feedback at scoring or level completion points. 通过调用手机的陀螺仪与震动反馈模块，开发者可以制作出具备沉浸式体验的小游戏或模拟类应用（如「手部放松模拟器」），在得分或通关节点触发定制音效与物理反馈。

Data shows that as of December 2025, users have cumulatively created over 12 million Flash Apps on the Lingguang platform. 数据显示，截至 2025 年 12 月，用户已在灵光平台累计创建超 1200 万个闪应用。

item.title: 2026 年春运启动：跨区域流动量预计达 95 亿人次
item.guid: 2026-年春运启动：跨区域流动量预计达-95-亿人次
item.description:
According to Xinhua News Agency, the 2026 Spring Festival travel rush officially began yesterday and will last for 40 days until March 13. 据新华社报道，2026 年春运已于昨日正式启动，持续至 3 月 13 日，为期 40 天。

The report points out that thanks to the 9-day "super long" holiday, with overlapping demand for returning home and tourism, the total cross-regional movement of people across society is expected to reach 9.5 billion person-times, setting a new historical record. 报道指出，得益于 9 天「超长」假期，返乡与旅游需求叠加，预计全社会跨区域人员流动量将达到 95 亿人次，创下历史新高。

Xinhua News Agency predicts that self-driving will remain the primary mode of travel, accounting for about 80%; railway and civil aviation passenger volumes are expected to reach 540 million and 95 million person-times respectively, with both overall scale and daily peak values likely to surpass historical levels for the same period. 新华社预计，自驾仍是主要出行方式，占比约八成；铁路与民航客运量预计分别达到 5.4 亿人次和 9500 万人次，整体规模及单日峰值均有望超过历史同期水平。

item.title: 千问 App 砸 30 亿开启春节免单活动
item.guid: 千问-App-砸-30-亿开启春节免单活动
item.description:
Yesterday, Qianwen App announced an investment of 3 billion yuan to launch its "Spring Festival Treat Plan," stating that it will invite people nationwide to enjoy free food, drinks, and entertainment during the Spring Festival, experiencing a new lifestyle in the AI era. 昨天，千问 App 宣布投入 30 亿元启动「春节请客计划」，宣布将以免单形式请全国人民在春节期间吃喝玩乐，感受 AI 时代的全新生活方式。

Alibaba ecosystem businesses such as Taobao Flash Sale, Fliggy, Damai, Hema, Tmall Supermarket, and Alipay will also collaboratively join this Spring Festival offensive. 淘宝闪购、飞猪、大麦、盒马、天猫超市、支付宝等阿里生态业务也将协同加入此次春节攻势。

According to the official preview, the plan will officially launch on February 6th. Besides large cash red packets, the core selling point is "eat, drink, play, and enjoy endless freebies." 据官方预告，该计划将于 2 月 6 日正式上线，除了大额现金红包，核心卖点在于「吃喝玩乐，免单不停」。

It is reported that this 3 billion yuan investment is not only the largest in Alibaba's history of Spring Festival activities but also the highest amount in the AI competition among major tech companies during this year's Spring Festival. 据悉，此次 30 亿元的投入不仅在阿里历史上的春节活动中规模最大，也是今年春节期间各大厂 AI 竞争中的最高金额。

Qianwen App stated that through this significant investment, it hopes to promote the transformation of AI assistants from mere chat tools to "AI Life Agents." By fostering the habit of "asking AI for help," it aims to solve the pain point of users repeatedly jumping between multiple apps, achieving a one-stop consumption experience from decision-making to fulfillment. 千问 App 表示，通过此次高额投入，其希望推动 AI 助手从单纯的聊天工具向「AI 生活 Agent」转型，通过「有事找 AI」的习惯培养，解决用户在多个 APP 间反复跳转的痛点，实现从决策到履约的一站式消费体验。

🔗 Related Reading: As Yuanbao just became a financial product, Alibaba's Qianwen immediately invested another 3 billion. 🔗 相关阅读： 元宝刚成为理财产品，阿里千问就又砸了30亿

item.title: 高端坚果逼近 200 元/斤，网友直呼「吃不起」
item.guid: 高端坚果逼近-200-元/斤，网友直呼「吃不起」
item.description:
According to Luzhong Morning Post, as the Year of the Horse Spring Festival approaches this year, prices of roasted goods for New Year's have generally risen. The unit price of some high-end nuts is approaching or even exceeding 200 yuan/jin, leading to widespread complaints from consumers on social media who feel they "can no longer afford them." 据鲁中晨报报道，随着今年马年春节临近，炒货类年货价格整体走高，部分高端坚果单价逼近甚至突破 200 元/斤，引发消费者在社交媒体上的集中吐槽，认为「越来越吃不起了」。

During a visit to the chain brand Xueji Roasted Goods, reporters found that basic sunflower seeds and peanuts were priced at 23.8 yuan per jin, while nuts like pistachios, freshly roasted cashews, and opened pine nuts generally approached 100 yuan per jin, with hand-peeled pine nuts reaching as high as 218 yuan per jin. 记者走访连锁品牌薛记炒货时发现，基础类瓜子、花生的售价已达每斤 23.8 元，而开心果、现烤腰果、开口松子等坚果类产品普遍接近 100 元/斤，手剥松子更是高达 218 元/斤。

In contrast, the current average price of pork is about 10 yuan per jin, a significant price difference. Due to its high pricing, Xueji Roasted Goods has been jokingly referred to by netizens as "Xueji Jewelry Store," "the Hermès of roasted goods," and so on. 相比之下，目前猪肉每斤均价约 10 元，价格差距明显。由于定价高企，薛记炒货被网友戏称为「薛记珠宝店」「炒货界的爱马仕」等。

Besides Xueji, the nut prices of Qi Wang Peanuts, a mall island brand, are also generally above 100 yuan per jin. Despite the price increase, many young consumers are still willing to queue to buy, indicating that high-end roasted goods remain strongly attractive in the Spring Festival consumption scene. 除薛记外，商场中岛品牌琦王花生的坚果定价同样普遍在 100 元/斤以上。尽管价格上涨，不少年轻消费者仍愿意排队购买，显示高端炒货在春节消费场景中的吸引力依旧强劲。

Industry insiders analyze that the price increase of high-end roasted goods is mainly driven by three factors: 业内人士分析称，高端炒货涨价主要受三方面因素推动：

    Consumption upgrades lead to brands concentrating in shopping malls, with rent and renovation costs pushing up selling prices;

    Upgrades in raw materials and processing technology, for example, brands claiming strict control over the number of sunflower seeds;

    Surging demand during the Spring Festival, driving short-term price increases.

Meanwhile, nut gift boxes continue to firmly hold the title of "King of Spring Festival Goods." According to data from the International Nut and Dried Fruit Council, Chinese consumers consume approximately 8 million tons of nuts and kernels annually, accounting for 15% of global production. Hema data shows that since the end of last year, its sales of nut gift boxes have increased by 168% year-on-year. 与此同时，坚果礼盒继续稳居春节「年货之王」。根据国际坚果及干果协会数据，中国消费者一年食用约 800 万吨坚果果仁，占全球产量的 15%。盒马数据显示，自去年底以来，其坚果礼盒销量同比增长 168%。

According to iiMedia Research data, over 80% of consumers spend between 20-100 yuan monthly on nuts and roasted goods, with the highest proportion of consumers purchasing once or more per month. In 2024, China's nut and roasted goods market size has exceeded 300 billion yuan, and is expected to grow to 428.3 billion yuan by 2029. 艾媒咨询数据显示，超过 80% 的消费者每月在坚果炒货上的花费集中在 20—100 元区间，且每月购买一次及以上的消费者占比最高。2024 年中国坚果炒货市场规模已突破 3000 亿元，预计到 2029 年将增长至 4283 亿元。

item.title: 《迈克尔 · 杰克逊：巨星之路》释出新海报
item.guid: 《迈克尔-·-杰克逊：巨星之路》释出新海报
item.description:
The Michael Jackson biopic "Michael Jackson: The Road to Stardom" recently released a new poster. The film is set to premiere in North America on April 24th this year. 迈克尔 · 杰克逊传记片《迈克尔·杰克逊：巨星之路》近日发布全新海报，影片将于今年 4 月 24 日在北美上映。

The main visual of the poster showcases the finalized look of Michael Jackson's nephew, Jaafar Jackson. 海报主视觉展示了迈克尔 · 杰克逊侄子 Jaafar Jackson 的定妆造型。

He is wearing a replica red zippered leather jacket, with silver mesh design on the shoulders consistent with the "Beat It" music video look, paired with aviator sunglasses and a slightly shy smile, leading many fans to comment that he "strikingly resembles" Michael himself. 他身穿复刻版红色拉链皮衣，肩部银色网状设计与《Beat It》MV 造型一致，搭配飞行员墨镜与略带腼腆的微笑，被不少粉丝评价为「神似」迈克尔本人。

The tagline "His Story Begins" on the poster has sparked further speculation about the film's structure. In addition to promising to depict his journey from Jackson 5 to global superstar, some fans believe this might hint at a multi-part film series to cover Michael's more complete life stages. 海报上的标语「His Story Begins」引发外界对影片结构的进一步猜测。除了承诺呈现从 Jackson 5 到全球巨星的成长轨迹外，有粉丝认为这可能暗示影片将采用多部曲形式，以覆盖迈克尔更完整的人生阶段。

The film was originally scheduled for release last year but was postponed to this year due to production delays. With the poster now released, the trailer is expected to drop during the Grammy Awards or next week's Super Bowl. 影片原定去年上映，因制作进度推迟至今年。随着海报释出、预告片预计将在格莱美奖或下周的超级碗期间发布。

item.title: 《重返 · 狼群》重映定档 2 月 19 日
item.guid: 《重返-·-狼群》重映定档-2-月-19-日
item.description:
The film "Return to the Wolves" announced its re-release in cinemas nationwide on February 19th (the third day of the Lunar New Year). 电影《重返 · 狼群》宣布将于 2 月 19 日（大年初三）在全国院线重映。

Directed by Yi Feng and produced by Li Weiyi, the film tells the true story of how she rescued Green, a dying wolf cub, in 2010 and eventually helped him return to the grasslands and rejoin his pack. Since its release in 2017, the film has moved a large audience with its cross-species emotional bond and authentic documentary footage. 影片由亦风执导，李微漪任制片人，讲述她在 2010 年救助濒死狼王幼崽格林，并最终帮助其重返草原、回归狼群的真实经历。自 2017 年上映以来，影片以跨越物种的情感羁绊和真实记录的影像打动了大量观众。

Its story also promoted the establishment of China's first wolf ecological protection and monitoring station. In 2021, wolves were listed as a national second-class key protected animal. 其故事也推动了中国首个狼生态保护监测站的建立。2021 年，狼被列为国家二级重点保护动物。

"Return to the Wolves" has a Douban rating of 8.3. 《重返 · 狼群》豆瓣评分为 8.3 分。

item.title: 《镖人》官宣春节全球同步上映
item.guid: 《镖人》官宣春节全球同步上映
item.description:
The Lunar New Year martial arts action film "Dao Ma" (镖人) announced its simultaneous release both domestically and internationally on February 17th, making it a rare Chinese martial arts blockbuster to be globally released during this year's Spring Festival holiday. 春节档武侠动作片《镖人》宣布将在 2 月 17 日海内外同步上映，成为今年春节档少见的全球同步发行的中国武侠大片。

Directed by Yuen Woo-ping and produced by Wu Jing and Yu Baimei, the film is adapted from Xu Xianzhi's comic of the same name. The story revolves around "Heavenly Character No. 2 Fugitive" Dao Ma, who takes on a special escort mission. He and his companions escort the target from the Western Regions to Chang'an, only to unexpectedly discover that the person being escorted is "Heavenly Character No. 1 Fugitive" Zhi Shilang. 影片由袁和平执导，吴京、俞白眉监制，改编自许先哲同名漫画，故事围绕「天字第二号逃犯」刀马接下特殊押镖任务展开，他与同伴从西域护送目标前往长安，却意外发现押送对象竟是「天字第一号逃犯」知世郎。

Multiple factions subsequently enter the fray, and conflicts surrounding the escort mission continuously escalate. 多方势力随之入局，围绕押镖任务的冲突不断升级。
